author: Marco, Your friendly Space Marine
text: Hi! Do not worry, Rushia. We, yoir fans, will always be here to support you. Your streams are wonderful to watch. I, too, am suffering from anxiety and watching you get through them with sheer will gives me strength. Please do continue doing your best. You've inspired me to do the same.

author: シットマン
text:
ホロの皆も表に出してないだけでなんか悩み抱えてたりするんだろうか・・・？
そりゃあ生きてれば皆何かしら悩みはあるんだろうけど。
その為に何もしてあげれない自分がもどかしい、悔しい・・・。
私は、社会の荒波に揉まれ、楽しい事や幸せな事など何一つ無く、生きていく事に絶望し、人間の愚かさに絶望し、
心身共に疲れ果て、自〇すら考えている。
でもそんな今の私唯一と言っていい毎日仕事から帰ってきて見るホロライブメンバーの配信に、心を支えられている。
ホロの皆にはこれからも心身共に元気で配信を続けていてほしい・・・。

text: To people who want to prevent toxic spammers in rushia's chat, don't tell them to not spam, instead just report and block them. author: shiinarei
text:
What a long and informative chat about our beloved necromancer. At some points it made me laugh or feel like crying with all her funny and sad stories. Let's always support her and be there by her side!

--

On an another note, I'm just disappointed at how some of you are making her uncomfortable. At this point you're just chasing her away and some things lead to others. 

Think before you comment.

author: GravityHurts

author: Takeshi Mitsuhide

author: shiinarei
text: @Takeshi Mitsuhide  indeed. The only way we can do is to report them.

author: Takeshi Mitsuhide
text: On the bright side, least Rushia couldn't understand foreign languages nor receiving death threats.

author: shiinarei
text:
@Takeshi Mitsuhide  Sadly, we shouldn't think of it that way. Whether it was for fun or seriousness, in a different stream someone said "Fuck You" and Rushia was caught by surprise when she mentioned it. She even stated "Why would you say this kind of thing?"

 It might seem funny with foreign phrases like this but it is definitely hurtful. That's why Rushia gets very uncomfortable with foreign spams

author: Aoi Tsukishiro
text:
This is so sad at this point. Her stream actually pretty fun and heartwarming to watch. Then you have few overseas viewers with their languages spamming the same jokes to get her attention, ruining the stream everytime they stick their fingers to keyboard/their phones.

But we also don't need to police the chat and become spammers itself. Just do what we should do : Report, Block, and Ignore.
